title: Hot curry paste
description: This curry paste is very versatile - you can use it as a dip by mixing it with yoghurt, or as an accompaniment to barbecued fish or vegetables.

default: 3 stalks lemongrass, tough outer layers removed

steps: Mix all the ingredients together, either in a food processor or in a large pestle and mortar, until they form a very smooth paste.
The paste needs to be smooth so it does not interfere with the textures and flavours of other ingredients.
